Noting that`` the business has become more complicated'' as Google has grown, Eric Schmidt wrote in his statement that he and Google's co-founders, Page and Sergey Brin , have been talking for a long time about how best to simplify our management structure, and looking for ways to`` speed up decision making.''`` I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even

Mr Eric Schmidt , speaking at the DLD media conference in Munich yesterday, said he expected to spend another 10 years at the company, after his surprise handover last week to co-founder Larry Page. I'm very personally excited about my next decade at Google, said Mr Eric Schmidt , who had previously said that the move was an effort to speed up decision-making. talkback No responses currently. of one sun god, Aton. The bust is at the top of a`` wish list'' of five major artefacts exhibited abroad that Egypt wants returned as part of its cultural heritage. Egypt recognises and appreciates the care and effort undertaken by the government of Germany to preserve and display the painted limestone bust of Queen Nefertiti, Zahi Hawass said in a statement. But he asked that`` this unique treasure be returned to the possession of its rightful owners, the Egyptian people.'' Article: Egypt asks Berlin to return Nefertiti

We'll see what happens over the next couple months. I just got to be patient and take it day by day, he said. Michael Vick , who made his three previous Pro Bowls in six years with the Atlanta Falcons. He is being coached this week by the Falcons' staff, though none of those

One of the CIA's victims was Mamdouh Habib , an Egyptian-born Australian citizen. U.S. agents bought him from Pakistani intelligence and shipped him to Egypt.`` In Egypt,'' reports Lisa Hajjar for Al Jazeera, he was repeatedly subjected to electric shocks, immersed in water up to his nostrils and beaten. His fingers were broken and he was hung from metal hooks. At one point, his interrogator slapped him so hard that his blindfold was dislodged, revealing the identity of his tormentor: Omar Suleiman . Frustrated that Mamdouh Habib was not providing useful information or confessing to involvement in terrorism, Omar Suleiman ordered a guard to murder a shackled prisoner in front of Mamdouh Habib , which he did with a vicious karate kick. Ibn al-Sheikh al-Libi was a former trainer in the Afghan jihadi camps who famously`` confessed'' a connection between Saddam and Al Qaeda while under torture in one of Omar Suleiman 's dungeons. , 22:16 EST Google announced Thursday that co-founder Larry Page would replace Eric Schmidt as chief executive of the Internet giant in April. Google said Eric Schmidt would remain with the company as executive chairman and focus on deals, partnerships, customers and broader business relationships. The firm's other co-founder, Sergey Brin , will work on strategic projects and new products, Google said in a statement. Quotes delayed, except where indicated otherwise. Delay times are 15 mins

coupons statement Thursday, Google's Eric Schmidt , announced that he will hand over the title of chief executive to Google co-founder Larry Page in April. In a message sent out on Twitter, Eric Schmidt said: Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed!
